channel.title: Alamogordo|Otero County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Alamogordo|Otero County|New Mexico|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-70 West - White Sands Missile Range Warning
item.description: Warning on US-70 west leaving Alamogordo: When flashing US-70 closed ahead. Expect one hour delay.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at Split
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70/US-54 split.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South at US-70 West
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West (Relief Route) at US-70 West exit to Las Cruces.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West - US-70/US-54 Split
item.description: US-70/US-54 Split on US-70 West/US-54 South (Alamogordo Relief Route). Use left lanes for US-54 south to El Paso.

item.title: US-70 West/US-54 South - Relief Route
item.description: US-70 West/US-54 South - Alamogordo Relief Route.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Relief Route
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West at US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route. Turn left for US-82 east to Cloudcroft. Turn right to continue on US-54 South/US-70 West to Las Cruces and El Paso (Alamogordo Relief Route). Continue straight for White Sands Blvd. and downtown Alamogordo. This is the western end of US-82.

item.title: US-54 South/US-70 West Approaching US-82
item.description: US-54 South/US-70 West approaching US-82 and Alamogordo Relief Route junction.

item.title: US-82 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-82 east, leaving Alamogordo. Distance to Cloudcroft, Mayhill, and Artesia.

item.title: US-82 East
item.description: First reassurance marker on US-82 east.

item.title: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82
item.description: White Sands Blvd. north at US-54/US-70/US-82 junction. Turn right for US-82 east; left for US-54 South/US-70 West; straight for US-54 North/US-70 East.

item.title: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82
item.description: White Sands Blvd. North at US-54/US-70/US-82 in Alamogordo. Turn left for US-54 South/US-70 West/Relief Route/Las Cruces/El Paso. Turn right for US-82/Cloudcroft. Continue straight for US-54 North/US-70 East/Tularosa. This is the northern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route. This is also the western terminus of US-82.

item.title: US-70 East at Alamogordo Relief Route
item.description: US-70 east at Alamogordo Relief Route. Exit here for US-70 East/US-54 North/Relief Route/Tularosa. Continue straight for downtown Alamogordo via White Sands Blvd. White Sands Blvd. rejoins US-54/US-70 on the north end of Alamogordo.

item.title: US-54 North at US-70
item.description: US-54 north at US-70 west, the southern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route. Turn right for US-54 North/US-70 East/Relief Route/Tularosa. Continue north for US-70 west, and downtown Alamogordo.

item.title: US-54 North at US-70 - Alamogordo Relief Route
item.description: US-54 north at US-70. Turn right to access US-82/Cloudcroft (via Alamogordo Relief Route).

item.title: US-54 North Approaching US-70
item.description: US-54 north approaching US-70 at the southern end of the Alamogordo Relief Route.

item.title: US-54 North Approaching US-70
item.description: US-54 north approaching US-70 in Alamogordo. Use US-70 west for Las Cruces. Use US-54 north for Alamogordo and Tularosa. US-70 joins US-54 north to Tularosa.
